meanings.definition: Dutifully complying with the commands or instructions of someone in authority.
meanings.sent1: The obedient student always follows the teacher's rules.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being obedient to her parents' wishes.
meanings.sent3: The robot was so obedient that it even cleaned itself!
meanings.sent4: The obedient dog never strays from its owner's side.
meanings.sent5: The obedient soldier never questioned his orders, always ready to serve.

meanings.definition: Willing to comply with or submit to authority.
meanings.sent1: An obedient citizen pays taxes on time.
meanings.sent2: The obedient employee always finishes tasks promptly.
meanings.sent3: The obedient kitten followed the yarn wherever it led.
meanings.sent4: The obedient river flowed steadily towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The obedient student raised their hand before speaking in class.
